channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Admits U.S. Constitution Bars Him from Running for Third Term: ‘If You Read It, It's Pretty Clear'
item.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson recently said he had spoken with Trump about the "constrictions" of term limits and doesn't "see the path" for serving beyo...

item.title: Cheryl Hines Questions If “The View” Hosts Read Her Book Before Awkward Interview: They 'Just Wanted to Grill Me' About RFK Jr.
item.description: Hines was "hoping" her Oct. 14 appearance on the talk show would be "more personal" rather than so focused on her husband's politics

item.title: Jason Kelce Shares How Choosing a Halloween Costume Is Different Since Welcoming His 4 Daughters
item.description: The retired NFL star and podcaster shares his daughters with Kylie Kelce

item.title: Prince Harry Reveals What He and Meghan Markle Will Do When Prince Archie, 6, and Princess Lilibet, 4, Want Phones
item.description: The Duke of Sussex spoke about the issue shortly after his brother, Prince William, shared that none of his three children have phones

item.title: Anne Hathaway's Red Valentino Gown Features a Subtle Nod to “The Devil Wears Prada”
item.description: The actress told 'WWD' that the gown had "extra significance"

item.title: Ariana Grande Goes Back to Brunette After Years of Icy Blonde Locks
